alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Montgomery; Moore; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 11:47PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Moore, southeastern Davidson, north central Montgomery and southern Randolph Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Badin Lake, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, dangerous lightning, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Asheboro, North Carolina Zoo, Seagrove, Steeds, Ulah, Coleridge and Martha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
